channel.title: MedscapeCME Ophthalmology Podcast
channel.itunes:author: MedscapeCME
channel.itunes:summary: Medscape offers free CME activities for physicians and other health professionals. Medscape is organized by medical specialty, with each supported specialty having its own customized Web site. Specialty content is evaluated, created, and presented under the guidance of a Medscape program director and a medical professional advisory board.

item.title: Making Medicare Preventive Services Part of Your Practice
item.description: During annual visits, make time to plan necessary screening and review the patient's overall health needs.
item.itunes:summary: During annual visits, make time to plan necessary screening and review the patient's overall health needs.
item.itunes:keywords: physical examination, normal,preventive screening,prevention, preventive medicine,patient counseling,Medicare,patient history

item.title: The EHR and Eligible Professionals: Improving Patient Care and Outcomes
item.description: What are the requirements for demonstrating meaningful use for the Medicare or Medicaid EHR incentive plans? How will patients and clinicians benefit?
item.itunes:summary: What are the requirements for demonstrating meaningful use for the Medicare or Medicaid EHR incentive plans? How will patients and clinicians benefit?
item.itunes:keywords: insurance, health - reimbursement ,electronic medical record (EMR),Medicare,technology, medical,Medicaid,management, patient care

item.title: Herpes Zoster: Strategies for Prevention
item.description: Is 50 the new 60 for zoster prevention? Read more and find out.
item.itunes:summary: Is 50 the new 60 for zoster prevention? Read more and find out.

item.title: The EHR and Hospitals: Improving Patient Care and Outcomes
item.description: What are the requirements for meaningful use of the Medicare/Medicaid incentive plans? How will hospitals and their patients benefit?

item.title: Understanding Zoster: Impact on the Individual and on Society
item.description: From chickenpox to shingles, the journey and unfortunate destination of varicella.
item.itunes:summary: From chickenpox to shingles, the journey and unfortunate destination of varicella.
item.itunes:keywords: varicella-zoster virus,herpes zoster,skin rash,immunizations,antiviral,Pain Management,elderly/concerns of older adults,vaccines,neuralgia, postherpetic,Vaccines, Adult

item.title: Minimally Invasive Facial Rejuvenation: A Case-Based Discussion
item.description: Drs. Marc Cohen, Steven Dayan, and Thomas Rohrer present and discuss cases that illustrate the use of minimally invasive techniques for facial rejuvenation.
item.itunes:summary: Drs. Marc Cohen, Steven Dayan, and Thomas Rohrer present and discuss cases that illustrate the use of minimally invasive techniques for facial rejuvenation.
